short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store notes on videos and share with others

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTubeNotes gives you the ability to capture notes for YouTube videos. You can capture them at various points in the video and markers will be placed on the video at the timestamps at which the note was captured.

You will be able to search your notes from the extension for all videos or just for the video you're watching. You can edit or delete the notes as you like. You will also be able to share and receive notes from others if you have an account with us.

If you want to print the notes, you can print per video. More information and frequently asked questions can be found on our page: https://browserext.com

Support is available as well via email if you encounter a problem
